issue.title: [Ruby] Add support for building Gandiva::Expression by Arrow::Schema#build_expression
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6619](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6619). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is the first attempt to make Red Gandiva API better.
This adds Arrow::Schema#build_expression, which aims to build Gandiva::Expression with FunctionNode or IfNode easily.
